subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Scottie Reynolds scored 40 points to lead Villanova to a 78-74 victory over Connecticut Wednesday night and improve the visiting Wildcats’ chances for an N.C.A.A. tournament bid.
snippet: Scottie Reynolds scored 40 points to lead Villanova to a 78-74 victory over Connecticut Wednesday night and improve the visiting Wildcats’ chances for an N.C.A.A. tournament bid.
